title: Change in TFR population data set

content.question: The total fertility rate in country A was 6.8 in 1980. Which of the following statements best supports the change in the total fertility rate in country A between 1980 and 2015?

choices.label: The total fertility rate increased as a result of improved health care and better nutrition.
The total fertility rate remained constant even though there was improved access to clean water.
The total fertility rate decreased as a result of a delay in age of first marriage and increased contraceptive use.
The total fertility rate decreased as a result of increased infant mortality rate.

content.answer: The total fertility rate decreased as a result of a delay in age of first marriage and increased contraceptive use.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe patterns or trends in data.
